citation: Mineral Resources Development (Fossicking Areas) Amendment Order 2003 (Tas)
text:
Mineral Resources Development (Fossicking Areas) Amendment Order 2003

I make the following order under section 116 of the Mineral Resources Development Act 1995 .

11 December 2003

P. A. LENNON

Minister for Economic Development, Energy and Resources

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Mineral Resources Development (Fossicking Areas) Amendment Order 2003 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Order
    In this order, the Mineral Resources Development (Fossicking Areas) Order 1996 is referred to as the Principal Order.

4.
The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Mineral Resources Development (Fossicking Areas) Order 1996 .

5.
The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Mineral Resources Development (Fossicking Areas) Order 1996 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 17 December 2003

This order is administered in the Department of Infrastructure, Energy and Resources.
